mutants.code:
from heapq import heappop, heappush

def calculate_recompression_times(n, k, video_uploads):
    heap = []
    busy = 1
    time = 0
    finish = [0] * n
    for i in range(n):
        if busy == k:
            time = heappop(heap)
            busy -= 1
        else:
            time = 0
        (start, minutes) = video_uploads[i]
        if start > time:
            time = start
        heappush(heap, time + minutes)
        finish[i] = time + minutes
        busy += 1
    return finish

        heappush(heap, time + minutes)

    return finish

def calculate_recompression_times(n, k, video_uploads):
    heap = []
    busy = 0

    for i in range(n):
        if busy == k:
            time = heappop(heap)
            busy -= 1
        else:

        (start, minutes) = video_uploads[i]
        if start > time:
            time = start
        heappush(heap, time * minutes)
        finish[i] = time + minutes
        busy += 1
    return finish
